00053 void
00054 GrDeformWave::Deform( GrMesh* dst, GrMesh* src, unsigned int srcRangeIdx, unsigned int time )
00055 {
00057         B_ASSERT( src != 0 );
00058 
00060         const GrMesh::SRange& srcRange = src->GetRange( srcRangeIdx );
00061 
00063         unsigned int start = srcRange.start;
00064         unsigned int count = srcRange.count;
00065         if ( src->GetIndexData() != 0 )
00066         {
00067                 start = srcRange.minIndex;
00068                 count = srcRange.maxIndex - srcRange.minIndex + 1;
00069         }
00070 
00071         GrMeshVB* vb = dst->GetVertexData();
00072         B_ASSERT( count == vb->GetVertexCount() );
00073 
00075         SVec3* vertexSrc = vb->GetVertices() + start;
00076         SVec3* normalSrc = vb->GetNormals() + start;
00077         SVec3* tangentSrc = vb->GetTangents() + start;
00078         SVec3* binormalSrc = vb->GetBiNormals() + start;
00079         SVec2* uvSrc = vb->GetTexCoords() + start;
00080 
00082         SVec3* vertexDst = vb->GetVertices();
00083         SVec3* normalDst = vb->GetNormals();
00084         SVec3* tangentDst = vb->GetTangents();
00085         SVec3* binormalDst = vb->GetBiNormals();
00086 
00088 //      Simulate( time );
00089 
00091 
00094         float scale1 = 0.1f;
00095         float scale2 = 0.05f;
00096         float scale3 = 0.2f;
00097         float scale4 = 0.075f;
00098 
00099         float freq1 = 2.0f;
00100         float freq2 = 4.0f;
00101         float freq3 = 1.0f;
00102         float freq4 = 2.666f;
00103 
00104         float speed1 = 0.543f;
00105         float speed2 = 1.05335f;
00106         float speed3 = 0.23f;
00107         float speed4 = 0.7f;
00108 
00109         unsigned int invSpeed1 = (unsigned int)( 1.0f / speed1 * 1000.0f );
00110         unsigned int invSpeed2 = (unsigned int)( 1.0f / speed2 * 1000.0f );
00111         unsigned int invSpeed3 = (unsigned int)( 1.0f / speed3 * 1000.0f );
00112         unsigned int invSpeed4 = (unsigned int)( 1.0f / speed4 * 1000.0f );
00113 
00115         float waveOffset1 = float( time % invSpeed1 ) / float( invSpeed1 ) * TWO_PI;
00116         float waveOffset2 = float( time % invSpeed2 ) / float( invSpeed2 ) * TWO_PI;
00117         float waveOffset3 = -float( time % invSpeed3 ) / float( invSpeed3 ) * TWO_PI;
00118         float waveOffset4 = -float( time % invSpeed4 ) / float( invSpeed4 ) * TWO_PI;
00119 
00121         float vertTheta;
00122         float vertSin;
00123         float vertCos;
00124         float tsbRotU;
00125 
00126 //      GLhandleARB prevShader = bglGetHandleARB( GL_PROGRAM_OBJECT_ARB );
00127 //      bglUseProgramObjectARB( 0 );
00128 //      bglBegin( GL_LINES );
00129         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < count; ++i )
00130         {
00131                 vertTheta = freq1 * vertexSrc[ i ].x + waveOffset1;
00132 //              vertTheta = freq1 * ( uvSrc[ i ].x + waveOffset1 ) * TWO_PI;
00133                 vertSin = Sin( vertTheta );
00134                 vertexDst[ i ] = vertexSrc[ i ] + scale1 * vertSin * normalSrc[ i ];
00135 
00136                 tsbRotU = ATan( scale1 * Cos( vertTheta ) );
00137                 vertSin = Sin( tsbRotU );
00138                 vertCos = Cos( tsbRotU );
00139                 normalDst[ i ] = vertCos * normalSrc[ i ] - vertSin * tangentSrc[ i ];
00140                 tangentDst[ i ] = vertCos * tangentSrc[ i ] + vertSin * normalSrc[ i ];
00141 /*

00145 
00146                 tsbRotU = ATan( scale2 * Cos( vertTheta ) );
00147                 vertSin = Sin( tsbRotU );
00148                 vertCos = Cos( tsbRotU );
00149                 normalDst[ i ] = vertCos * normalDst[ i ] - vertSin * binormalSrc[ i ];

00151

00155
